ygData.subject: Re: rez question
ygData.msgSnippet: You can doubt it all you want, but its true...... Mr. J Daniels
ygData.messageBody:
You can doubt it all you want, but its true......

Mr. J Daniels


On Wed, 7 Jul 1999, Slithey Tove wrote:

> From: "Slithey Tove" <slithey@...>
>
> Huh? I seriously doubt this, unless a level 30 wizard is stealing from a
> level 15 group. That doesn't happen much, because high level people aren't
> This is a very dumb situation, and I don't understand why Verant has let it
> continue.
>
> == Gilead, 19th level dwarven cleric of Fennin Ro
>
> -----Original Message-----
> From: Mr. J Daniels <warpig@...>
> To: EQ-Clerics@onelist.com <EQ-Clerics@onelist.com>
> Date: Wednesday, July 07, 1999 4:16 PM
> Subject: Re: [EQ-Clerics] rez question
>
>
> >From: "Mr. J Daniels" <warpig@...>
> >
> >Even if they made it so a groups combined damage was taken into
> >consideration solo wizards would still get the kill credit. They can do
> >so much damage per spell that there really isn't enough HP left on a mob
> >for a group total to be more.
> > Verants choice of whoever does the most damage vs. group damage, makes
> >no difference.
> >
> >
> >Mr. J Daniels
>
>
